Dalek...
data.text:
Dalek

Daleks are hostile entities that seek to eradicate all other living beings.

Attributes

Daleks currently have three variants, each with their own attributes

Regular

Health: 80 (40 hearts)

Movement Speed: 0.55

Attack Damage: 5 (2.5 hearts)

Attacks per Second: 1

Can Fly: True

Rusty

Health: 60 (30 hearts)

Movement Speed: 0.4

Attack Damage: 2 (1 heart)

Attacks per Second: 0.5

Can Fly: False

Special Weapons

Health: 120 (60 hearts)

Movement Speed: 0.5

Attack Damage: 10 (5 hearts) + Explosion Damage (if enabled via server config)

Attacks per Second: 0.6

Can Fly: True

AI Behavior

Daleks will target all living entities by default. This can be configured via the Tardis server config file, such as ignoring villagers, ageable animal entities.

Some exceptions are:

Raider entities such as Pillagers, Vindicators

Armor Stands (which are living entities)

Some Dalek variants can also fly or hover over air blocks and will do so to reach their targets

Variants

The Special Weapons variant shoots explosive lasers by default. The laser explosion can be configured to only occur for impacts on blocks, and respects mob griefing game-rules.

The Rusty variant is a weakened variant. It has reduced fighting and movement capabilities.

Spawn Behavior

Generated Structures

Daleks spawn inside and around their Dalek Ship structures and do not spawn elsewhere naturally.

Daleks currently do not despawn naturally.

Village Raids

Daleks are also classified as Raider entities, so they will join in Village Raids alongside other raiders such as Pillagers. The Dalek's ability to join raids, and the number of Daleks per raid wave can be configured in the Tardis Common file.

Spawn Drops
